main event: Observers watched a large, fiery object fall towards the ground, then suddenly take off and disappear.
interesting points: The object looked like it was going to crash, but then suddenly took off and disappeared.
The observer was familiar with aircraft and their behavior, but was unable to identify this object.
The object was saucer-shaped and behaved strangely, tilting towards the ground and drifting like a parachute.
The object disappeared suddenly, as if maintaining the observer's 50 mph speed.
The observer heard a peculiar noise when the object disappeared.
